details: Supported new students during orientation, providing guidance on college resources and campus navigation
Assisted in organizing workshops on resume building and interview preparation for peers in the Computer Programming program.
Facilitated peer-to-peer tutoring sessions focused on data structures, algorithms, and web development.
Managed event logistics for college technology meetups and hackathons, fostering networking opportunities for students.
Developed and maintained scalable web applications using React and Node.js.
Integrated Firebase Authentication for secure user login and data management.
Implemented Stripe Payment Gateway to process secure online transactions.
Collaborated in an Agile environment, participating in daily stand-ups and sprint planning.
Conducted code reviews ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices.
